General.Name: Nanjing Bestway Intelligent Control Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Nanjing Bestway Intelligent Control Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, production, sale, and servicing of intelligent mining products and solutions. Its products include mine management and control platform, mine information application software, and mining supporting facilities, as well as mine network communication information, mine production control, and mine production auxiliary systems. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jiangning, China.

1.Name: Mr. Ruofan  Duan
1.Title: Director and Sec. of the Board
